thread.title: Emmerdale spoiler: Megan and Leyla devastated when hen do for client comes under threat of failing
thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoiler: Megan and Leyla devastated when hen do for client comes under threat of failing

author: Lara Martin
title: Emmerdale spoiler: Megan and Leyla devastated when hen do for client comes under threat of failing
text:
Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing!   
There’s trouble brewing for Megan Macey and Leyla Harding in tonight’s Emmerdale when they find out a planned hen-do for a client is at risk of being cancelled. 
The pair’s business faces a major problem when it emerges the venue they’ve booked has been shut down because of an insect infestation. 
What will they do?! 
Megan ends up having to ask Charity Dingle if they can hold the bride’s party at The Woolpack - completely unaware that Charity was the one who ruined the original plans in the first place in order to claim the business. There is bad news for the girls tonight (Photo: ITV) Their client's hen do is at risk (Photo: ITV) It's a blow for the business (Photo: ITV) 
Someone who does know, however, is Frank Clayton, who overhears an interesting conversation about Charity’s wicked scheming. 
He does little about it, however; does that suggests he approves? 
Meanwhile, Megan finds out and is furious with Charity and rushes off to confront her. Will it end well? 
*Emmerdale airs 7pm and 8pm on ITV Like us on Facebook
